sn14.32:1.2: “Pathavidhatuyaham, bhikkhave, assadapariyesanam acarim, yo pathavidhatuya assado tadajjhagamam, yavata pathavidhatuya assado pannaya me so sudittho.
sn14.32:1.3: Pathavidhatuyaham, bhikkhave, adinavapariyesanam acarim, yo pathavidhatuya adinavo tadajjhagamam, yavata pathavidhatuya adinavo pannaya me so sudittho.
sn14.32:1.4: Pathavidhatuyaham, bhikkhave, nissaranapariyesanam acarim, yam pathavidhatuya nissaranam tadajjhagamam, yavata pathavidhatuya nissaranam pannaya me tam sudittham.
sn14.32:2.3: vayodhatuyaham, bhikkhave, assadapariyesanam acarim, yo vayodhatuya assado tadajjhagamam, yavata vayodhatuya assado pannaya me so sudittho.
sn14.32:2.4: Vayodhatuyaham, bhikkhave, adinavapariyesanam acarim, yo vayodhatuya adinavo tadajjhagamam, yavata vayodhatuya adinavo pannaya me so sudittho.
sn14.32:2.5: Vayodhatuyaham, bhikkhave, nissaranapariyesanam acarim, yam vayodhatuya nissaranam tadajjhagamam, yavata vayodhatuya nissaranam pannaya me tam sudittham.
sn14.32:3.1: Yavakivancaham, bhikkhave, imasam catunnam dhatunam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam na abbhannasim, neva tavaham, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddhoti paccannasim.
sn14.32:4.1: Yato ca khvaham, bhikkhave, imasam catunnam dhatunam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam abbhannasim, athaham, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddhoti paccannasim.
sn14.32:4.3: ‘akuppa me vimutti, ayamantima jati, natthi dani punabbhavo’”ti.
